documentation.text:
@title ERC20 implementation
 @notice Implementation of the ERC20 interface
@notice The number of decimals of the token

@notice Returns the total supply of the token
 @return __totalSupply The total supply of the token

params._owner: The address that is allowed to spend the tokens
params._spender: The address that is allowed to spend the tokens

returns.remaining: The amount of tokens that the specified address is allowed to spend on behalf of the message sender

params._spender: The address to be approved to spend the tokens
params._value: The amount of tokens to be approved to be spent

returns.success: true if the approval was successful, false otherwise

params._owner: The address to query the balance of

returns.balance: The balance of the specified address

params.__totalSupply: The total supply of the token
params._decimals: The number of decimals of the token

returns.__totalSupply: The total supply of the token

returns.success: true if the transfer was successful, false otherwise
true if the transfer was successful, false otherwise

allowance(address,address).notice: Returns the amount of tokens that the specified address is allowed to spend on behalf of the message sender

approve(address,uint256).notice: Approves the specified address to spend the specified amount of tokens on behalf of the message sender

balanceOf(address).notice: Returns the balance of the specified address

decimals().notice: The number of decimals of the token

totalSupply().notice: Returns the total supply of the token

transfer(address,uint256).notice: Transfers tokens from the message sender to the specified address

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).notice: Transfers tokens from a specified address to another specified address
